title: How to make your own Android ROM (revised).pdf
description:
Here is the revised version with the Errors removed.

An E-book covering the basics of how to make your own Custom ROM for Android 
Smartphones. For the sake of ease, the Samsung Galaxy S3 has been used to create and test the Custom ROM. The same method should be applicable on other Android Smartphones as well. All credit goes to PC Mag's Darren Yates who wrote this Article. Its been made into an E-Book so that you can read it even when you don't have Access to the article online. The Format is pdf and so you'll need Adobe Reader or another similar Software that can open pdf Files. Enjoy and please make sure you Seed.

Last time when this was uploaded the police took away Piratebay's servers. This was taken down as well. I've uploaded it again. Enjoy
